page_content:
![](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/_assets/3137b1a864c689786cac76b3def62dd1/Assets/img/default-banner.jpg)

# Cancelling the Registration of a Vehicle Registered or Sold Outside Québec

You can cancel the registration of a vehicle that was licensed or sold outside Québec and obtain a reimbursement in the following cases:

- you registered your vehicle outside Québec
- you sold your vehicle outside Québec

## Procedure to follow to cancel the registration of a vehicle

## If you are an individual:

You must send us the form [Cancellation of the Registration of a Vehicle Licensed or Sold Outside Québec and/or a Driver’s Licence (PDF, 132.1 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/cancellation-registration-vehicule-licensed-sold-outside-quebec.pdf) in order to cancel your vehicle registration.

Enclose one of the following documents:

- a photocopy of the registration certificate issued in the vehicle’s place of provenance
- a photocopy of the sales contract or invoice, if the vehicle was sold

#### In person

Go to one of our [service outlets](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/find-service-outlet) with your driver's licence and, if possible, one of the following documents:

- a photocopy of the registration certificate issued in the vehicle’s place of provenance
- a photocopy of the sales contract or invoice, if the vehicle was sold

### Processing time

Due to a high number of requests, expect longer processing times if you request the cancellation by mail or by fax. If you are in Québec, we recommend that you go to a service outlet to ensure quick processing.

#### By mail

Division du permis de conduire et de l’immatriculation

Société de l’assurance automobile du Québec

333, boulevard Jean-Lesage

Case postale 19600, succursale Terminus

Québec (Québec)  G1K 8J6

#### By fax

Québec area: 418-528-7001

Elsewhere (Québec, Canada, United States): 1‑855‑465-7227

## In the case of a business

If you are the person authorized to act on behalf of the business, you must send us the form [Cancellation of the Registration of a Vehicle Licensed or Sold Outside Québec and/or a Driver’s Licence (PDF, 132.1 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/cancellation-registration-vehicule-licensed-sold-outside-quebec.pdf) in order to cancel the vehicle registration.

Enclose one of the following documents:

- a photocopy of the registration certificate issued in the vehicle’s place of provenance
- a photocopy of the sales contract or invoice, if the vehicle was sold

In person

If none of the business’s directors can be present, the mandatary must present the original of a document authorizing them to act on behalf of the business.

Go to one of our service centres with your driver’s licence and, if possible, one of the following documents:

- a photocopy of the registration certificate issued in the vehicle’s place of provenance
- a photocopy of the sales contract or invoice

By mail

Service aux entreprises

Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec

333, boulevard Jean-Lesage

Case postale 19600, succursale Terminus

Québec (Québec)  G1K 8J6

By fax

Québec area: 418 643-5131

Elsewhere (Québec, Canada, United States): 1‑855‑868-0152

## Reimbursement of vehicle registration fees further to cancellation

The amount of the reimbursement of vehicle registration fees is determined based on:

- the date on which the vehicle was registered
- the date indicated on the sales contract or invoice
- the date the cancellation request is received

Last update: January  7, 2026

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That’s why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
